features.name: Initialize Git repository
features.description: Initialize git repo with .gitignore for Node.js/TypeScript project
steps: Run git init in project directory

test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify .git folder exists and .gitignore is properly configured

features.name: Initialize package.json
features.description: Create package.json with project metadata and scripts
steps: Run npm init or create package.json manually
Add scripts for dev, build, test, lint

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm install and verify no errors

features.name: Configure TypeScript
features.description: Set up TypeScript with strict configuration
steps: Create tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled
Configure paths, outDir, and module resolution

test_instructions.manual_verification: Create test .ts file and compile successfully

features.name: Configure ESLint and Prettier
features.description: Set up linting and formatting tools
steps: Add lint and format scripts to package.json

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm run lint and npm run format

features.name: Set up project directory structure
features.description: Create folder structure for src, tests, config
steps: Create src/ with subdirs: api, detection, ui, notifications, ai, utils

test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify all directories exist with correct structure

features.name: Configure environment variables
features.description: Set up dotenv and environment configuration
steps: Create config/env.ts for typed env access

test_instructions.unit: Test env.ts loads and validates variables
test_instructions.manual_verification: Copy .env.example to .env and verify app loads

features.name: Set up testing framework
features.description: Configure Jest or Vitest for testing
steps: Create sample test to verify setup

test_instructions.unit: Run npm test to execute sample test
test_instructions.manual_verification: Verify test output shows passing test

features.name: Set up database with Prisma
features.description: Initialize Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npx prisma db push to verify connection

features.name: Set up Next.js frontend
features.description: Initialize Next.js with App Router

test_instructions.manual_verification: Run npm run dev and verify app loads at localhost:3000

features.name: Configure Tailwind CSS
features.description: Set up Tailwind CSS for styling

test_instructions.manual_verification: Add Tailwind class to component and verify styling

features.name: Gamma API client initialization

Configure base URL and default headers

test_instructions.manual_verification: Make test request to Gamma API

test_instructions.e2e: Fetch price history for known market

features.description: Monitor USDC deposits from wallets to Polymarket contracts

steps: Add relations to Market and Wallet

features.name: Database connection pooling

steps: Set pool size based on load

features.name: Data retention and cleanup jobs
features.description: Automated cleanup of old data to manage storage

features.name: Database indexing optimization
features.description: Create indexes for frequently queried fields

features.name: Time-series data storage
features.description: Optimize storage for time-series market data

features.name: Wallet age calculator

features.name: Fresh wallet threshold configuration
features.description: Configurable thresholds for what constitutes a fresh wallet
steps: Support age and tx count thresholds

features.name: Zero trading history detector
features.description: Identify wallets with no prior Polymarket trading history

features.name: First trade size analyzer
features.description: Flag when first trade from wallet is unusually large

features.name: Wallet funding pattern analyzer
features.description: Analyze how fresh wallets are funded before trading

features.name: Fresh wallet clustering
features.description: Detect multiple fresh wallets potentially controlled by same entity

features.name: Wallet reactivation detector
features.description: Detect dormant wallets suddenly becoming active

features.name: Fresh wallet confidence scorer
features.description: Score likelihood that fresh wallet activity is suspicious

features.name: Wallet history depth analyzer
features.description: Analyze depth of wallet transaction history across chains

features.name: Fresh wallet alert generator
features.description: Generate alerts when fresh wallet criteria are met

features.name: Market baseline volume calculator
features.description: Calculate normal volume baseline for each market

features.name: Rolling volume average tracker
features.description: Track rolling average volume over configurable windows

features.name: Volume spike detector
features.description: Detect sudden spikes in trading volume above threshold

features.name: Individual trade size analyzer
features.description: Flag individual trades significantly larger than average

features.name: Whale trade threshold calculator
features.description: Dynamically calculate whale thresholds per market

features.name: Volume-to-liquidity ratio analyzer
features.description: Analyze trade volume relative to available liquidity

features.name: Time-of-day volume normalizer
features.description: Normalize volume analysis for time-of-day patterns

features.name: Consecutive large trade detector
features.description: Detect series of large trades in quick succession

features.name: Market impact calculator
features.description: Calculate price impact of large trades

features.name: Unusual volume alert generator
features.description: Generate alerts when volume anomalies are detected

features.name: Volume clustering analyzer
features.description: Detect coordinated volume from multiple wallets

features.name: Pre-event volume spike detector
features.description: Detect volume spikes before scheduled events

features.name: Market category classifier
features.description: Classify markets into categories (political, geopolitical, etc.)

features.name: Information-advantage market identifier
features.description: Identify markets where insider info would be most valuable

features.name: Geopolitical event market tagger
features.description: Tag markets related to geopolitical events

features.name: Political market identifier
features.description: Identify markets related to political decisions/events

features.name: Regulatory decision market detector
features.description: Detect markets about regulatory decisions

features.name: Market liquidity scorer
features.description: Score markets by liquidity to identify thin markets

features.name: Niche market watchlist manager
features.description: Maintain watchlist of high-priority niche markets

features.name: Wallet niche market concentration analyzer
features.description: Detect wallets focusing on specific niche categories

features.name: Cross-market correlation detector
features.description: Detect correlated trading across related niche markets

features.name: Niche market alert generator
features.description: Generate alerts for suspicious niche market activity

features.name: Wallet behavior profiler
features.description: Build behavioral profiles for tracked wallets

features.name: Trading pattern classifier
features.description: Classify wallet trading patterns (scalper, insider, etc.)
features.notes: Implemented TradingPatternClassifier with 15 pattern types (SCALPER, DAY_TRADER, WHALE, BOT, POTENTIAL_INSIDER, etc.), feature extraction, risk flag detection, caching, and batch classification. 89 unit tests and 40 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Timing pattern analyzer
features.description: Analyze timing patterns of wallet trades

features.name: Win rate tracker
features.description: Track historical win rate for each wallet

features.name: Profit/loss calculator
features.description: Calculate realized and unrealized P&L for wallets
features.notes: Implemented ProfitLossCalculator with position tracking, realized/unrealized P&L calculation, window-based analysis (DAY/WEEK/MONTH/QUARTER/YEAR/ALL_TIME), category-specific stats, suspicion scoring for insider detection, and batch analysis. 92 unit tests and 36 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Position sizing pattern analyzer
features.description: Analyze how wallets size their positions

features.name: Market selection pattern analyzer
features.description: Analyze which markets wallets tend to trade
features.notes: Implemented MarketSelectionAnalyzer with: track market selection, identify preferences (HIGH_VOLUME, LOW_VOLUME, NEAR_RESOLUTION, NEW_MARKETS, CATEGORY_SPECIALIST, EVENT_DRIVEN, etc.), detect selection shifts (CATEGORY_CHANGE, CONCENTRATION_INCREASE/DECREASE, WIN_BIAS_INCREASE), score selection patterns (UNKNOWN, DIVERSE, FOCUSED, SPECIALIST, OPPORTUNISTIC, CONTRARIAN, MOMENTUM, SYSTEMATIC, RANDOM, INSIDER_LIKE), suspicion scoring (0-100), batch analysis with caching, and comprehensive factory/convenience functions. TypeScript types verified clean, 75+ unit tests and 30+ E2E tests written.

features.name: Coordinated trading detector
features.description: Detect multiple wallets trading in coordination
features.notes: Implemented CoordinatedTradingDetector with: 9 coordination pattern types (SIMULTANEOUS, MIRROR_TRADING, COUNTER_PARTY, ORDER_SPLITTING, COPY_TRADING, RELAY_TRADING, FUNDING_LINKED, PROFIT_EXTRACTION, MULTI_PATTERN), 12 coordination flags, pair-wise similarity analysis (timing correlation, market overlap, size similarity, direction alignment, win rate correlation), group detection with union-find clustering, risk level assessment (NONE/LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH/CRITICAL), confidence scoring, batch analysis with caching, event emission for detection alerts. ~85 unit tests and ~20 E2E tests covering: mirror trading rings, wash trading, copy trading, order splitting, fresh wallet swarms, insider-like coordination, multi-pattern detection, and legitimate independent traders (negative case).

features.name: Sybil attack detector
features.description: Detect potential sybil attacks using multiple wallets
features.notes: Implemented SybilAttackDetector with cluster detection using union-find, wallet similarity analysis (funding, timing, behavior, gas patterns), ~80 unit tests, ~10 E2E test scenarios

features.name: Historical accuracy scorer
features.description: Score wallets based on historical prediction accuracy
features.notes: Implemented HistoricalAccuracyScorer with prediction tracking, conviction-weighted accuracy, Brier score calculation, anomaly detection (timing advantage, contrarian success, category expertise, sudden improvement), time-window analysis, trend detection, ~70 unit tests, ~25 E2E test scenarios

features.name: Composite suspicion score calculator
features.description: Calculate overall suspicion score from multiple signals
features.notes: Implemented CompositeSuspicionScorer integrating all 10 signal sources (fresh wallet, win rate, P&L, timing patterns, position sizing, market selection, coordination, sybil, accuracy, trading patterns). Features: configurable signal/category weights, suspicion level thresholds (NONE/LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH/CRITICAL), caching with TTL, batch processing, event emission, detailed signal contributions, category breakdown, risk flag aggregation, potential insider detection. ~65 unit tests, ~30 E2E test scenarios.

features.name: Signal weight configurator
features.description: Configure weights for different detection signals
features.notes: Implemented SignalWeightConfigurator class with comprehensive weight management: 8 presets (DEFAULT, NETWORK_FOCUSED, PERFORMANCE_FOCUSED, BEHAVIOR_FOCUSED, CONSERVATIVE, AGGRESSIVE, FRESH_WALLET_FOCUSED, INSIDER_DETECTION, CUSTOM), 3 validation modes (STRICT, NORMALIZE, NONE), per-signal and per-category weight configuration, weight sum validation, file persistence (save/load to JSON), change history tracking, event emission, weight impact analysis, import/export functionality, shared instance management. 120 unit tests and 36 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Dynamic threshold adjuster
features.description: Automatically adjust thresholds based on market conditions
features.notes: Implemented DynamicThresholdAdjuster class with: 8 market regimes (NORMAL, HIGH_VOLATILITY, LOW_VOLATILITY, HIGH_ACTIVITY, LOW_ACTIVITY, BULL_MARKET, BEAR_MARKET, EXTREME), 8 condition metrics (VOLUME, VOLATILITY, ACTIVE_TRADERS, ACTIVE_MARKETS, TRADE_SIZE, SENTIMENT, LIQUIDITY, FRESH_WALLET_ACTIVITY), automatic regime detection using z-scores, 6 default adjustment rules, configurable thresholds for suspicion levels/flag/insider, manual threshold override support, rule management (add/remove/enable/disable), comprehensive history tracking, file persistence (save/load), import/export functionality, event emission for all changes. 95 unit tests and 37 E2E tests pass.

features.name: False positive reducer
features.description: Apply filters to reduce false positive alerts

features.name: Alert priority ranker
features.description: Rank alerts by priority/urgency for user attention

features.name: Confidence level calculator
features.description: Calculate confidence level for each detection

features.name: Historical score calibrator
features.description: Calibrate scoring based on historical outcomes

features.name: Multi-signal correlation scorer
features.description: Boost score when multiple signals correlate

features.name: Main dashboard layout
features.description: Primary dashboard layout with responsive grid
features.notes: Implemented main dashboard layout with: DashboardLayout component with header, stats bar, responsive grid main content, and footer; WidgetContainer component with loading states, refresh capability, and customizable actions; DashboardSkeleton for loading state display; StatusIndicator showing connected/disconnected/connecting states; QuickStats bar with 4 key metrics; Responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 col tablet, 3 col desktop); 5 widget placeholders (Alert Feed, Active Signals, Suspicious Wallets, Hot Markets, Large Trades). 32 unit tests and 29 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Real-time alert feed widget
features.description: Live-updating feed of latest alerts

features.name: Active signals counter
features.description: Display count of current active signals by type
features.notes: Implemented ActiveSignalsCounter component with: 8 signal types (FRESH_WALLET, WHALE_ACTIVITY, COORDINATED_TRADING, UNUSUAL_VOLUME, PRICE_ANOMALY, INSIDER_PATTERN, SYBIL_DETECTION, NICHE_MARKET); signal counts grouped by type with status indicators (ACTIVE/MONITORING/RESOLVED); real-time updates via props; visual indicators including emoji icons, color-coded badges, status dots, trend arrows; summary section with total/types/critical badges; sortable by count (active first); keyboard accessible with tabIndex and Enter/Space support; full dark mode support. 77 unit tests and 44 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Top suspicious wallets widget
features.description: Show top wallets by suspicion score

features.name: Hot markets widget
features.description: Display markets with most suspicious activity
features.notes: Implemented HotMarketsWidget component with: 8 market categories (POLITICS, CRYPTO, SPORTS, ENTERTAINMENT, FINANCE, SCIENCE, GEOPOLITICAL, OTHER); 5 heat levels (CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW, NONE); 6 alert types (WHALE_ACTIVITY, COORDINATED_TRADING, VOLUME_SPIKE, PRICE_MANIPULATION, FRESH_WALLET_CLUSTER, INSIDER_PATTERN); heat score bar with fill percentage; alert type badges with emoji icons; category icons; probability with change indicator; volume display; alert count; last alert time; watch/unwatch functionality; ranking by heat score descending; loading skeleton state; empty state; summary section with critical/high/watched counts. 114 unit tests and 53 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Recent large trades widget
features.description: Show recent trades above whale threshold
features.notes: Implemented RecentLargeTradesWidget component with: 2 trade directions (BUY/SELL); 3 size categories (WHALE >= $100K, VERY_LARGE >= $25K, LARGE >= $10K); trade item display with index badge, direction badge, size category badge, USD value, price/probability, market title, wallet address, timestamp; special indicators for whale/maker/suspicious trades; summary section with total volume, whale count, suspicious count, buy/sell counts; tx hash links to Polygonscan; loading skeleton state; empty state; real-time prop updates; keyboard navigation; accessibility features. 95 unit tests and 53 E2E Puppeteer browser tests. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: System status indicator
features.description: Show connection status for all data sources
features.notes: Implemented SystemStatusIndicator component with: 5 data source types (GAMMA_API, CLOB_API, WEBSOCKET, POLYGON_RPC, DATABASE); 5 connection statuses (CONNECTED, DISCONNECTED, CONNECTING, DEGRADED, UNKNOWN); 4 system health levels (HEALTHY, DEGRADED, CRITICAL, OFFLINE); compact view with connection count and health icon; expandable detailed view with all sources; source items with status indicator, icon, label, description, status label, and latency; health summary with connected/degraded/disconnected counts; critical and offline alert messages; sort sources by status (disconnected first); last refresh timestamp; keyboard navigation support; full accessibility support. 112 unit tests and 49 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Quick stats summary bar
features.description: Summary stats bar with key metrics
features.notes: Implemented QuickStatsSummaryBar component with: 8 stat types (ACTIVE_ALERTS, CRITICAL_ALERTS, SUSPICIOUS_WALLETS, HOT_MARKETS, LARGE_TRADES, WHALE_TRADES, TOTAL_VOLUME, CONNECTED_SOURCES); 5 stat categories (ALERTS, WALLETS, MARKETS, TRADES, SYSTEM); 3 trend directions (up, down, neutral) with percentage display; real-time value updates with animation on change; color-coded stat items with emoji icons and background colors; highlighted/critical state indicators with pulsing animation; footer with total alerts and critical badges; refresh button with loading state; last updated timestamp display; keyboard navigation and full accessibility support (tabIndex, role=button, aria-labels); responsive grid layout (2 cols mobile, 4 cols tablet, 8 cols desktop). Helper functions: calculateTrend(), formatStatValue(), formatTrendValue(), formatLastUpdated(), generateMockStats(). 69 unit tests and 33 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Dashboard refresh controls
features.description: Manual refresh and auto-refresh toggle
features.notes: Implemented DashboardRefreshControls component with: 6 refresh interval options (OFF, 5s, 10s, 30s, 1m, 5m); 4 refresh states (IDLE, REFRESHING, SUCCESS, ERROR); manual refresh button with spinner/success/error icon states; auto-refresh toggle with dropdown interval selector; countdown display showing time until next auto-refresh; last refresh time display with relative formatting (Just now, Xs ago, Xm ago, Xh ago); disabled state during refresh; keyboard navigation (Enter to activate, Escape to close dropdown); full accessibility support (aria-label, aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role=listbox/option, aria-selected); responsive design (works on desktop, tablet, mobile); integration with DashboardLayout in header; full dashboard refresh triggers all widgets refresh in parallel. Helper functions: formatRelativeTime(), formatTimeUntilRefresh(), generateMockRefreshState(). 107 unit tests and 35 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Dashboard theme toggle
features.description: Light/dark theme toggle for dashboard
features.notes: Implemented ThemeContext and ThemeProvider with: light/dark/system theme support; localStorage persistence with 'polymarket-tracker-theme' key; system theme detection via prefers-color-scheme media query; inline script to prevent flash of incorrect theme; ThemeToggle component with 3 modes (icon, button, dropdown), 3 sizes (sm, md, lg), full accessibility (aria-label, aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role=listbox/option), keyboard navigation (Enter, Space, Escape, Tab), click-outside-to-close, animated icon transitions. Integrated into DashboardLayout header with showThemeToggle prop. Helper functions: getThemeOption(), getResolvedThemeIcon(), generateMockThemeState(). 104 unit tests and 33 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass.

features.name: Alerts list view
features.description: Paginated list view of all alerts
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive AlertsListView component with: /alerts page route; AlertsListView component with full pagination (prev/next, page numbers, ellipsis for many pages); AlertListItem component with severity badge, type badge, unread indicator, tags display, market/wallet context; PaginationControls with items info, page navigation; EmptyState with customizable message and icon; AlertsListSkeleton for loading state; stats badges (unread, critical, high counts); back to dashboard navigation; full dark mode support; responsive design (mobile/tablet/desktop); keyboard navigation (Enter/Space to activate, focusable items); ARIA accessibility (role=article, aria-label, aria-current); data attributes for filtering (data-alert-id/type/severity/read); scroll to top on page change. Helper functions: formatAlertDate(), formatFullDate(), calculatePagination(), getPageNumbers(), generateMockPaginatedAlerts(). 125 unit tests and 47 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Alert detail modal
features.description: Detailed view of individual alert with all context
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive AlertDetailModal component with: modal component at app/alerts/components/AlertDetailModal.tsx; full alert details display (title, message, type icon, severity badge, timestamps with relative and full format); related data section showing market name, wallet address (truncated with copy button), and navigation buttons to market/wallet pages; action buttons (dismiss, mark read/unread, acknowledge) with state updates; investigate link for navigation; body scroll lock when modal open; escape key and backdrop click to close; focus management (close button receives focus on open); smooth enter animation; responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop; full dark mode support; WCAG accessibility (role=dialog, aria-modal, aria-labelledby, accessible labels). Helper functions exported: formatDetailDate, formatRelativeTime, getSeverityDescription, getAlertTypeDescription, getActionButtons, truncateAddress, copyToClipboard. Integrated into /alerts page with state management for selected alert and modal visibility. 55 E2E Puppeteer browser tests and 70+ unit tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Alert type filter
features.description: Filter alerts by type (fresh wallet, volume, etc.)
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive AlertTypeFilter component with: filter dropdown with all 12 alert types (WHALE_TRADE, PRICE_MOVEMENT, INSIDER_ACTIVITY, FRESH_WALLET, WALLET_REACTIVATION, COORDINATED_ACTIVITY, UNUSUAL_PATTERN, MARKET_RESOLVED, NEW_MARKET, SUSPICIOUS_FUNDING, SANCTIONED_ACTIVITY, SYSTEM); 4 type categories (TRADING, WALLET, MARKET, SYSTEM) with category-level toggle; individual type checkboxes with icons and labels; Select All / Clear buttons; active filter count badge on button; ActiveFilterChips component showing selected types as removable chips with Clear All link; filter results summary showing filtered/total counts; empty state for no matching alerts; global Escape key handler to close dropdown; click-outside-to-close; full accessibility (aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role=listbox, aria-label, aria-selected); full dark mode support with dark: classes; responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop. Integrated into AlertsListView with props: showTypeFilter, onTypeFilterChange, initialTypeFilters. Filter state resets pagination to page 1. Helper functions exported: getTypeCategory, areAllTypesSelected, areNoTypesSelected, areCategoryTypesSelected, areSomeCategoryTypesSelected, getSelectedTypesLabel. 99 unit tests and 34 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Alert severity filter
features.description: Filter alerts by severity/priority level
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive AlertSeverityFilter component with: 5 severity levels (CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW, INFO) ordered by rank; severity icons, labels, and descriptions; filter dropdown with Select All/Clear buttons; quick presets for 'Critical & High' and 'Medium & Above'; checkbox selection for individual severities; ActiveSeverityChips component for displaying selected severities as removable chips; CombinedFilterSummary component for showing filter results; full integration with AlertsListView supporting combined type+severity filtering; purple color scheme to distinguish from type filter; full accessibility (aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role=listbox/option, keyboard navigation, Escape to close); dark mode support with dark: variant classes; click-outside-to-close and Escape key handlers. Helper functions exported: areAllSeveritiesSelected, areNoSeveritiesSelected, areCriticalHighSelected, getSelectedSeveritiesLabel, getSeverityRank, sortSeverities. 92 unit tests and 37 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Alert date range filter
features.description: Filter alerts by date range
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive AlertDateRangeFilter component with: 10 preset options (ALL_TIME, TODAY, YESTERDAY, LAST_7_DAYS, LAST_30_DAYS, LAST_90_DAYS, THIS_WEEK, THIS_MONTH, THIS_YEAR, CUSTOM); custom date range picker with start/end date inputs; timezone-aware date calculations using Intl API; date range validation (start before end, not in future); green color scheme to distinguish from type (blue) and severity (purple) filters; ActiveDateRangeChip component for displaying active filter as removable chip; CombinedDateFilterSummary component for filter results display; full integration with AlertsListView supporting combined type+severity+date filtering; preset quick-select buttons and period presets; keyboard navigation (Escape to close); click-outside-to-close dropdown; full accessibility support (aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role=listbox/option); full dark mode support with dark: variant classes. Helper functions exported: getStartOfToday, getEndOfToday, getStartOfYesterday, getEndOfYesterday, getStartOfThisWeek, getStartOfThisMonth, getStartOfThisYear, getDateRangeFromPreset, formatDateForDisplay, formatDateForInput, parseDateFromInput, getDateRangeLabel, isDateRangeActive, isDateInRange, validateDateRange. 90+ unit tests and 37 E2E Puppeteer browser tests written. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Wallet profile page
features.description: Detailed profile page for individual wallet
features.notes: Implemented wallet profile page at /wallet/[address] with three main components: WalletProfileHeader (displays address, badges, metadata, action buttons), SuspicionScoreDisplay (circular gauge showing 0-100 score with risk level and flags), and ActivitySummaryWidget (comprehensive trading statistics grid). Features include: copy-to-clipboard address, Polygonscan link, monitor/flag toggles, wallet type badges (EOA/CONTRACT/EXCHANGE/DEFI/BOT), status badges (whale/insider/fresh/monitored/flagged/sanctioned), dynamic risk levels (CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW/NONE), circular progress indicator with gradient colors, 5 risk flag types, detailed activity stats (total volume, P&L, win rate, trade count, average/max trade size, first/last trade dates, wallet age, on-chain tx count), responsive design (mobile/tablet/desktop), full dark mode support, comprehensive error handling (invalid address, loading states, empty states). 19 unit tests pass validating prop types, nullable fields, callback functions, edge cases. 35 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass covering page loading, component rendering, interactive elements, error handling, screenshots, responsive viewports. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Wallet trading history table
features.description: Paginated table of wallet trading history
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive WalletTradingHistoryTable component with full pagination, sorting (timestamp/size/price/P&L), and expandable row details. Supports page sizes 10/25/50/100, displays market links, outcome/side badges, formatted USD amounts and percentages, and shows transaction hashes with Polygonscan links. Includes 52 unit tests covering all formatting, sorting, and pagination logic, plus 46 E2E browser automation tests. Dark mode fully supported.

features.name: Wallet P&L chart
features.description: Chart showing wallet profit/loss over time
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive P&L chart with SVG visualization, time range selector (1D/1W/1M/3M/1Y/ALL), interactive tooltips, profit/loss zones with color coding, and axis labels. Chart displays cumulative P&L over time with green for profit and red for loss. Includes mock data generation function that creates realistic P&L trends. All 12 E2E tests pass including chart rendering, time range filtering, interactivity, responsiveness, and error handling.

features.name: Market detail page
features.description: Detailed page for individual market
features.notes: Implemented complete market detail page with: MarketDetailHeader (question, status badges, category badge, volume/liquidity display, created/end dates, description, market ID), CurrentOddsDisplay (outcome probabilities with bars, share prices, 24h change indicators, sorted by probability), MarketInfoSection (status, time remaining, resolution source, last updated, Polymarket link, copy market ID/URL buttons). Full dark mode support, responsive design (mobile/tablet/desktop), TypeScript types verified clean. Unit tests and E2E tests written. All components properly structured in app/market/[id]/ directory.

features.name: Market price chart
features.description: Interactive price/probability chart over time
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive MarketPriceChart component with: SVG-based interactive line chart showing price/probability over time; Time range selector with 6 options (1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 6M, ALL); Zoom controls (zoom in/out/reset) with level indicator and pan support; Key event markers with color-coded types (news/trade/alert/other) and tooltips; Responsive SVG chart with area gradient fill; Interactive hover tooltips showing price, date, and volume; Y-axis with percentage labels (0-100%), X-axis with smart date formatting based on time range; Grid lines (configurable); Generated 180 days of mock price history data with realistic trends, sine waves, noise, and occasional jumps; Mock event generator for chart markers; Integrated into market detail page below current odds display; 45 unit tests and 40 E2E Puppeteer browser tests covering rendering, time range selection, zoom controls, event markers, grid lines, axes, responsive behavior, dark mode, accessibility, error handling, and visual verification with screenshots. TypeScript types verified clean (component files have no errors). Browser testing confirmed all features working correctly including zoom, pan, time range switching, and event markers.

features.name: Market volume chart
features.description: Trading volume chart over time
features.notes: Implemented MarketVolumeChart component with bar chart visualization, time range selector (1D/1W/1M/3M/6M/ALL), interactive tooltips, anomaly detection highlighting volume spikes (>2.5 std deviations), grid lines, responsive SVG design, and legend. Component integrated into market detail page. 32 unit tests and 41 E2E Puppeteer tests passing. Typecheck passes.

features.name: Settings page layout
features.description: Main settings page with categorized sections
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive settings page with 4 main categories: Alert Thresholds, Notifications, Display, and Privacy. Features include: form state management with unsaved changes tracking, save/reset functionality with success/error messages, responsive design with mobile/tablet support, full dark mode support, and navigation back to dashboard. Created 38 unit tests and 40 E2E tests with Puppeteer, all passing.

features.name: Alert threshold configuration
features.description: UI to configure alert thresholds
features.notes: Alert threshold configuration UI is fully implemented with 4 threshold inputs (volumeSpike, whaleTradeMinimum, suspicionScore, priceChange). All inputs have proper validation (min/max), test IDs, and are integrated with the save/reset functionality. The UI displays current values, allows updates, tracks unsaved changes, and persists settings. 38 unit tests and 40 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean. Screenshots confirm visual correctness.

features.name: Notification preferences
features.description: Configure notification channels and frequency
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive notification preferences UI with all channels (Email, Push, SMS) and settings. Features include: Email notifications with address input, Push notifications toggle, SMS notifications with phone number input (conditional display), Notification frequency selector (realtime/hourly/daily), Quiet hours with start/end time inputs. All settings properly integrated with form state management, save/reset functionality, and change tracking. Added 5 new SMS-related E2E tests to the existing 40 tests. Total of 38 unit tests and 45 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean for settings page. Screenshots confirm proper UI rendering in both light and dark modes, with responsive design for mobile/tablet.

features.name: Line chart component
features.description: Reusable line chart for time series data
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive LineChart component with: single/multiple series support, SVG-based rendering with viewBox for responsive scaling, interactive tooltips with hover detection, optional area fill with configurable opacity, grid lines (horizontal/vertical), axis labels (X/Y) with custom formatters, loading skeleton state, empty state with custom message, legend for multiple series, dark mode support, custom tooltip formatter support, 8 default color palette, helper functions (formatNumber, formatDate), comprehensive TypeScript types (LineChartDataPoint, LineChartSeries, LineChartProps). Created demo page at /demo/charts with 7 examples (single series, multiple series, numeric x-axis, without grid, loading, empty, custom tooltip). 46 unit tests pass covering: component structure, data handling, series configuration, formatting functions, dimensions, display options, loading/empty states, type safety, edge cases (negative/zero/large/small values, mixed ranges, flat data), accessibility, responsive design, performance (1000 points, 10 series with 100 points each), integration. 36 E2E Puppeteer browser tests pass covering: page load, chart rendering, SVG elements, line paths, data points, grid lines, axis labels, multiple series, legend, tooltips (show/hide on hover), loading skeleton, empty state, responsive design (mobile/tablet/desktop), dark mode, accessibility (no console errors, heading hierarchy, text contrast), performance (load time), chart variations, visual verification (screenshots). TypeScript types verified clean with no errors.

features.name: Bar chart component
features.description: Reusable bar chart for volume/comparison data
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive BarChart component with: single/multiple series support, stacked and grouped bar modes, interactive tooltips, responsive sizing, grid lines, axis labels, loading/empty states, custom colors, bar spacing configuration. Created complete demo page with 7 examples (simple, stacked, grouped, no grid, loading, empty, custom tooltip). Includes 234 unit tests and 17 E2E browser test scenarios with screenshot verification. TypeScript types verified clean. Component fully functional in /demo/charts page.

features.name: Chart time range selector
features.description: Common time range selector for charts (1H, 24H, 7D, etc.)
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive ChartTimeRangeSelector component with preset ranges (1H, 1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, ALL), optional custom date range picker, multiple size variants (sm/md/lg), helper functions (timeRangeToMs, timeRangeToDays, getCutoffDate, filterDataByTimeRange), and useChartTimeRange hook. Integrated into demo page at /demo/charts with multiple examples. All 43 unit tests and 10 E2E tests pass. Component supports dark mode, responsive design, and full keyboard accessibility.

features.name: Email service integration
features.description: Integrate email service provider (SendGrid, Resend, etc.)
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive email service integration using Resend as the email provider. Features: EmailClient class with configurable settings (apiKey, defaultFrom, defaultFromName, defaultReplyTo, devMode, rateLimit, maxRetries, retryDelay), development mode that logs instead of sending, rate limiting with token bucket algorithm, exponential backoff retry logic, event emission (sending/sent/failed/delivered/bounced), batch email sending with configurable batch size, email validation (recipients, subject, content), support for HTML/text content, CC/BCC recipients, custom headers and tags, email priority levels, statistics tracking. Created types for EmailMessage, EmailSendResult, EmailClientConfig, BatchEmailResult, AlertEmailData, DigestEmailData. Helper functions: normalizeRecipients, extractEmails, isValidEmail, formatRecipient. Environment variables: RESEND_API_KEY, EMAIL_FROM, EMAIL_FROM_NAME. 58 unit tests and 23 E2E tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Alert email template
features.description: HTML email template for alert notifications
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive alert email template with HTML and plain text versions. Supports 12 alert types (whale_trade, insider_activity, etc.) and 5 severity levels (critical, high, medium, low, info). Features include: email-safe HTML with table-based layout, inline styles, MSO conditionals for Outlook, dark mode support, XSS protection via HTML escaping, customizable options (footer, branding, timezone, custom styles), metadata display, and email client integration. Created templates/types.ts, templates/alert-template.ts, and templates/index.ts. 97 unit tests and 43 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Daily digest email
features.description: Daily summary email of activity and alerts

features.name: Telegram bot setup
features.description: Create and configure Telegram bot

features.name: Telegram alert message formatter
features.description: Format alert messages for Telegram

features.name: Telegram instant notifications
features.description: Send instant alerts via Telegram

features.name: Discord webhook setup
features.description: Configure Discord webhook for notifications

features.name: Discord embed formatter
features.description: Format alerts as Discord embeds
features.notes: Implemented embed-formatter.ts with 25+ functions: buildAlertEmbed, formatDiscordAlert, createAlertMessage, createAlertEmbeds, createAlertSummaryEmbed, and utility embeds (success, error, info, warning). Supports all 12 alert types, 5 severity levels with appropriate colors, market/wallet links, suspicion scores, trade sizes, and price changes. 96 unit tests and 59 E2E integration tests pass.

features.name: Web push notification setup
features.description: Configure web push notifications

features.name: Push notification service worker
features.description: Service worker for background push
features.notes: Implemented service worker (public/sw.js) with push event handling, notification display with full customization (icons, badges, images, actions, vibration patterns), notification click handling with action routing, and TypeScript utilities (src/notifications/push/service-worker.ts) for registration, subscription management, and version checking. 64 unit tests pass.

features.name: Notification queue system
features.description: Queue system for processing notifications

features.name: Notification deduplication
features.description: Prevent duplicate notifications for same alert
features.notes: Implemented NotificationDeduplicator class with content-based key generation, configurable per-channel deduplication windows, in-memory caching with TTL, event emission for monitoring, singleton management, and comprehensive statistics tracking. 65 unit tests and 20 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Notification rate limiting
features.description: Rate limit notifications to prevent spam

features.name: Multi-channel notification router
features.description: Route notifications to configured channels
features.notes: Implemented NotificationRouter class with: channel handler registration, user preference management (per-channel config, priority thresholds, fallback channels), quiet hours support with bypass priority, payload adaptation between channel types, retry logic with exponential backoff, comprehensive event system, and statistics tracking. 45 unit tests pass.

features.name: Anomaly detection model training pipeline
features.description: Pipeline to train anomaly detection models on historical data

features.name: Real-time anomaly scoring
features.description: Score incoming trades for anomaly probability
features.notes: Implemented RealtimeAnomalyScorer class with model loading, feature extraction from trades/wallet/market context, real-time inference, risk level calculation, caching, batch scoring, and event emission. 64 unit tests and 29 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Wallet clustering algorithm
features.description: Cluster wallets by behavioral similarity

features.name: Alert summary generator
features.description: Generate natural language summaries of alerts
features.notes: Implemented AlertSummaryGenerator class with multiple summary styles (BRIEF, STANDARD, DETAILED, TECHNICAL, CASUAL), key insights extraction, suggested actions generation, risk assessment scoring, caching system, batch processing, and comprehensive event emission. 127 unit tests and 43 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Market context analyzer
features.description: Analyze market context from news/social media
features.notes: Implemented MarketContextAnalyzer with content source management, sentiment analysis, relevance scoring, impact prediction, entity extraction, activity correlation, caching, and batch processing. Supports multiple source types (news, Twitter, Reddit, official, etc.), category-specific keywords, and configurable thresholds. 121 unit tests and 49 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Insider probability predictor
features.description: Predict probability that activity is insider-related
features.notes: Implemented InsiderProbabilityPredictor with 21 feature definitions across 6 categories (wallet behavior, timing, market selection, trading pattern, performance, network), multiple calibration methods (Platt, isotonic, beta, temperature), prediction verification with accuracy metrics tracking, batch processing, caching, and comprehensive risk assessment. 83 unit tests and 48 E2E tests pass.

features.name: Market outcome predictor
features.description: Predict market outcomes based on insider signals

features.name: Signal effectiveness tracker
features.description: Track which signals historically predicted outcomes

features.name: Model performance dashboard
features.description: Dashboard showing AI model performance metrics

features.name: Backtesting framework
features.description: Framework to backtest detection strategies
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive BacktestingFramework with: backtesting engine supporting multiple validation methods (walk-forward, k-fold CV, train/test split); historical data loading with mock data generation for trades, markets, wallets, alerts; detection strategy simulation for 8 strategy types (INSIDER_DETECTION, WHALE_DETECTION, FRESH_WALLET_DETECTION, COORDINATED_TRADING, VOLUME_ANOMALY, PRICE_MANIPULATION, COMPOSITE, CUSTOM); comprehensive metrics calculation (accuracy, precision, recall, F1/F2 scores, MCC, AUC-ROC, AUC-PR, Brier score, log loss); walk-forward fold tracking with overfitting detection; period metrics breakdown; performance tier assessment (EXCELLENT/GOOD/ACCEPTABLE/POOR/VERY_POOR); insight generation (strengths, weaknesses, recommendations, warnings); event emission for backtest lifecycle; caching support; statistics tracking. Created src/ai/backtesting-framework.ts with types, enums, classes, factory functions, and utilities. 99 unit tests and 22 E2E tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.

features.name: Model retraining scheduler
features.description: Automated retraining of models on new data

features.name: Gamma API client unit tests
features.description: Unit tests for Gamma API client methods
features.notes: Fixed import path aliases and verified all 446 tests pass: client (19), rate-limiter (48), cache (76), paginate (35), error-handler (67), markets (201). Also fixed TypeScript errors in model-retraining-scheduler tests.

features.name: Validate and load environment configuration
features.description: Ensure all env vars are loaded and validated on startup
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive env validation in config/env.ts with URL validation for GAMMA_API_URL, CLOB_API_URL, CLOB_WS_URL (WebSocket). Added TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN format validation, TELEGRAM_ADMIN_IDS as comma-separated number list. Includes logConfig() for redacted logging, validateEnv() for validation results, and initializeEnv() for startup initialization. 41 unit tests and 11 E2E tests pass.
steps: Update config/env.ts to validate all required vars
Add POLYGON_RPC_URL validation with connection test
Throw clear error if any required var missing
Log loaded config (redacted secrets) on startup

features.name: Telegram subscribers database table
features.description: Database table to store all bot subscribers (users and groups)
steps: Fields: id mod, chatId (BigInt unique), chatType (enum: PRIVATE/GROUP/SUPERGROUP/CHANNEL)
Fields: username (optional), firstName (optional), title (optional for groups)
Add index on chatId and isActive

features.name: Telegram bot initialization with grammy
features.description: Set up Telegram bot using grammy library
features.notes: Implemented TelegramBotClient class with full lifecycle management (initialize, start, stop), message sending, command/callback handlers, admin checking, and health monitoring. 41 unit tests and 8 E2E tests pass.
steps: Add error handler for bot errors
Export bot instance and start/stop functions
Use polling for dev, webhook option for production

features.name: Auto-register users on /start command
features.description: Automatically save user to database when they send /start
steps: Check if subscriber exists in database by chatId
If new: create TelegramSubscriber with default alertPreferences
If exists but inactive: set isActive = true
Send welcome message with bot capabilities

test_instructions.manual_verification: New user sends /start, appears in DB

features.name: Auto-register groups when bot added
features.description: Automatically register group when bot is added to it
steps: Create TelegramSubscriber for group with chatType GROUP/SUPERGROUP
If bot removed (status 'left'/'kicked'), set isActive = false

test_instructions.e2e: Add bot to group, verify registration
test_instructions.manual_verification: Add to test group, see in DB

features.name: Unsubscribe with /stop command
features.description: Allow users to stop receiving alerts
features.notes: Implemented /stop command handler with: handleStopCommand(), createStopCommandHandler() factory, unsubscribeUser() function, getUnsubscribeMessage(), getAlreadyUnsubscribedMessage(), getNotFoundMessage(). Sets isActive=false with deactivationReason='User sent /stop command'. Preserves subscriber data for resubscribe. Works for private chats and groups. 29 unit tests and 22 E2E tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.
steps: Set isActive = false (don't delete, allow resubscribe)
Send confirmation: 'You will no longer receive alerts. Send /start to resubscribe.'

test_instructions.manual_verification: Stop, then verify no alerts received

features.name: Alert preferences with /settings command
features.description: Let users configure which alerts they receive
features.notes: Implemented /settings command with inline keyboard showing: Whale Alerts (ON/OFF), Insider Alerts (ON/OFF), Min Trade Size ($1K/$10K/$50K/$100K submenu), Severity (All/High+Critical/Critical only submenu). Added callback handlers for real-time preference updates with confirmation messages. 309 tests pass including 57 new settings-specific tests.
steps: Show inline keyboard with current preferences
Options: Whale Trades (on/off), Fresh Wallets (on/off), Min Trade Size ($1K/$10K/$50K/$100K), Severity (All/High+Critical/Critical only)
Handle callback queries to update preferences
Confirm changes with updated settings display

features.name: Status and help commands
features.description: Informational commands for users
steps: Create /help command - list all commands with descriptions
Create /status command - show bot status, your subscription status, alerts received today
Create /stats command (admin only) - show total subscribers, alerts sent, system health

features.name: Alert broadcaster service
features.description: Broadcast alerts to all active subscribers
steps: Query all TelegramSubscribers where isActive = true
For each subscriber: check if alert matches their alertPreferences
Format message using existing Telegram formatter
Send with rate limiting (max 30 messages/sec for Telegram)
Return delivery stats: sent, skipped, failed

features.name: Handle blocked users gracefully
features.description: Deactivate users who block the bot
features.notes: Implemented comprehensive blocked user handling with: (1) Extended DeactivationInfo type with reasonType and errorCode, (2) logDeactivation() function for structured logging, (3) shouldDeactivateOnError() with proper pattern matching for BLOCKED_BY_USER, USER_DEACTIVATED, CHAT_NOT_FOUND, BOT_KICKED, (4) markBlockedWithReason() method in subscriber service, (5) SubscriberCleanupService with configurable periodic cleanup, preview mode, and start/stop controls. Added 50+ new unit and E2E tests, all 147 broadcaster tests pass.
steps: In broadcaster, catch errors when sending
If error code 403 (Forbidden/blocked): set isActive = false
If error code 400 (chat not found): set isActive = false
Don't retry failed sends to blocked users
Add periodic cleanup job for long-inactive subscribers (optional)

features.name: Admin broadcast command
features.description: Allow admins to send announcements
features.notes: Implemented /broadcast command (admin only) with message parsing, subscriber iteration, error handling, and detailed report. Added /test command to send test alerts. Includes rate limiting (50ms delay between sends), blocked user detection via broadcaster module, and comprehensive error reporting. 256 unit tests and 148 E2E tests pass.
steps: Send message to all active subscribers
Report: 'Sent to X subscribers, Y failed'
Create /test command to send test alert to yourself only

features.name: Market sync background service
features.description: Periodically fetch and store live market data
steps: Create MarketSyncService class with start/stop methods
On start: fetch all active markets from Gamma API
Store/update markets in database using Prisma upsert
Calculate volume change since last sync
Log sync stats: markets synced, new markets, volume changes

test_instructions.manual_verification: Check fresh market data in DB

features.name: Live trade stream WebSocket processor
features.description: Connect to Polymarket WebSocket and process trades in real-time
features.notes: Implemented TradeStreamService in src/services/trade-stream.ts. Uses existing TradeStreamClient WebSocket infrastructure. Processes trades in real-time, stores them via TradeService, creates/updates wallets via WalletService, emits events for whale trades (trade:whale), new wallets (wallet:new), and processed trades (trade:processed). Tracks processing statistics. 30 unit tests and 19 E2E integration tests pass.
steps: Use existing WebSocketManager to connect to CLOB_WS_URL
Subscribe to trade events for all/watched markets
On trade message: parse trade data (wallet, market, size, price, side)

features.name: Real-time wallet profiler
features.description: Profile wallets as trades come in
steps: Check if wallet exists in database
If new wallet: fetch on-chain data (age, tx count, funding source)
Use existing detection modules to calculate suspicion score
Cache recent profiles to avoid redundant lookups

features.name: Real-time alert generator
features.description: Generate alerts from detection signals and broadcast
steps: Run detection algorithms: fresh wallet, whale trade, volume spike, etc.
If detection triggers: create Alert in database
Call Telegram broadcaster to send alert
Deduplicate similar alerts within time window

test_instructions.manual_verification: See alert in DB and Telegram

features.name: Dashboard stats API endpoint
features.description: API endpoint for dashboard statistics
features.notes: Implemented GET /api/dashboard/stats endpoint with: DashboardStatsResponse type with alerts, criticalAlerts, suspiciousWallets, hotMarkets, volume24h, whaleTrades, trends object, and generatedAt timestamp; Parallel database queries for current (last 24h) and previous (24-48h ago) period statistics; Trend calculation as percentage change between periods; 30-second in-memory caching with TTL; Cache headers (max-age=30, stale-while-revalidate=60); X-Cache header (HIT/MISS/STALE); Graceful error handling returning stale cache on database errors; Uses Prisma client for queries (alert.count, wallet.count, alert.groupBy, trade.aggregate, trade.count). 18 unit tests and 26 E2E tests pass. TypeScript types verified clean.
steps: Query database for: total alerts (24h), critical alerts, suspicious wallets count, hot markets count, total volume (24h), whale trades count
Return JSON: { alerts, criticalAlerts, suspiciousWallets, hotMarkets, volume24h, whaleTrades, trends }

Query alerts from database with filters
Include related market and wallet data

features.name: Performance benchmarks
features.description: Comprehensive performance benchmarks for all systems
